= pacman =

== search ==
- Qs        search with string

== sync ==
- Syu       sync update yes

== downgrade ==
- U         /var/cache/pacman/XXX.pkg.tar.xz

== remove ==
- R         remove
- Rc        remove X and package which depend on X
- Rs        remove X and package which X depend on and no other package
depend on it.
